resources.string: Note: The table analyses and rates the state on the basis of above 5 parameters and gives a cumulative score highlighting the present scenario in the state.
Noe: The table gives the minimum and maximum possible total number of cases for next five days including today.

string-array.name: india_states
string-array.item: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu

resources.string: In the wake of coronavirus outbreak, itâ€™s quite difficult to assess the odds of whether to travel to a particular state or not. To tackle this problem, We, a team of 5 talented lads, armed with technologies, built an android application that will show you the complete picture of the present situation in India and how well your destination state is performing. It also gives you your probability of getting infected if you are travelling to another state. The prediction model tries to predict the total number of cases in India for next five days including today. With these informations, the app makes it easy for you to figure out how safe it is for you to travel to another state.
